Trinity/Nightlight:

Trinity was happy when she heard all things that Aerotaur had said 
and more happy when she listened that Angel Prime liked to train 
her "CAN I BE TRAINED? AEROTAUR OOOHHHH PLEASE..." said Trinity "ANY 
MEAN BOT COULD HURT YOU IF I SCARED THEM, UNCLE AEROAUT... PLEASE CAN 
I BE TRAINED?..."

"WHAT?" replied Nightlight
